programme.title: The Fear Clinic: Face Your Phobia
programme.desc: Chloe has a phobia of people being sick. For Milly its frogs. Theyre both worried about passing their phobias on to their children. Paula has a spider phobia. Can the clinic help?

programme.desc: Joe Lycett and Roisin Conaty visit the fairy-tale city of Salzburg, where they enjoy a three-course meal on horse and carriage tour, some forest-bathing, and a spot of musical cycling.

programme.desc: The boys head to Essex to secretly fix up a real 70s supercar, famous for turning into a submarine in a James Bond film. But it hasnt been started in 20 years.

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, the Garners help Sue and Don find their dream holiday home. The Hamiltons search for a beachfront property in Málaga for sports fanatic and former client Neal.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Mike takes living conditions back to basics at a 200-year-old mountain village in Spain. In France, Paul and Yip balance the demands of unstable structures in their hamlet.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets a woman who wants to build a shop and a mobile home out of an old horsebox, but only has £500 to spend. He also meets a couple who are creating a holiday let out of a 1960s milk float.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sandra and Gary cant wait to find their dream holiday home on Spains Costa Cálida... despite never having been there before!

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Eve and Vinden Grace are looking for a place that they can use for holidays for now, but where they will eventually live half the year. They have identified the Gulf Coast of Florida as having the perfect blend of lifestyle, culture and climate.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first to host in Edinburgh is 28-year-old Andy Daykin who has opted for a somewhat cliched Scottish themed night for his dinner party - complete with haggis, bag pipes, whisky and Cranachan. His guests include self-confessed cougar, Liz Grant, who is planning on pouncing on any available young man during this weeks dinner parties.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day two in Edinburgh and the host is Polish-born catering manager, Irena Magdolowic. She claims to be the perfect cook and the perfect host, so coupled with this and her Polish menu Irena is convinced shes going to bag the £1,000 prize. Having been bored by the conversation last night, Irena plans to ban any political chat and replace it instead with a night of traditional Polish food and entertainment.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Edinburgh, its the turn of self-confessed cougar Liz Grant to play host. Having flirted with 28-year-old Andy for the last two nights, `Luscious Liz is determined to make her move tonight. Unfortunately Andy isnt quite so keen. In fact, hes so worried about Liz making her move that hes vowed never to find himself alone in her house. With a day of cooking ahead, Liz cant worry about her chances with Andy.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day four of the competition from Edinburgh, and the host is PA and rock chick, 26-year-old Michelle Lindsay. The week hasnt been great for Michelle so far, as shes been served up all sorts of nasty treats from hair in her dinner, to food that resembles poo! So, Michelle is fairly confident that it wont be too hard to wow her guests with her bizarre array of dishes.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final day of the competition in Edinburgh and tonight is the turn of Italian-born food snob, Toni Giugliano to host. Toni thinks that he has been served up poor food all week and tonight is his chance to take the £1,000 prize by impressing his guests with his specially created Scottish/Italian menu.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jo and Neil are starting a new life in Lecce in southern Italy, and want a property thats close to the beach with a guest annexe. Jasmine Harman shows them what their £200k budget can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Its full steam ahead for train driver Wayne and train manager Kate, as Lee Juggurnauth shows them the best of what their £85k budget can get them in the town of Pinar de Campoverde, Spain.

programme.title: Belle Starr
programme.desc: Belle Starr is the daughter of a Southern aristocrat. When the invading Yankees take over her land, she vows revenge and heads to Missouri where she marries Confederate outlaw Sam Starr, and joins him and his gang in harrying the occupying troops. In fact, the real Belle Starr was a simple outlaw who, with her Cherokee husband, used the opportunity of the confusion of war to line their own pockets.

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Action-packed special following the elite teams of Durham and Cleveland as they chase down some of the UKs most dangerous drivers. programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Without doubt, a huge influence over modern British cuisine are the flavours of the Mediterranean. Brought at first by the Romans and more recently by hordes of holidaymakers returning from the sun, the range of dishes and ingredients we have adopted from the Med are now commonplace on our menus and in our homes. Dave Myers and Si King look at how this has evolved and create their favourite dishes.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from Scotland must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again. They need to impress a panel of exacting judges.

programme.title: Worlds Sneakiest Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham meets a host of animals that use deceptive tactics to find food. New science reveals that some trick their prey, like the manipulative mantis that looks like a flower and killer whales that set traps using sound. Others cheat each other - sea otters demand ransoms after kidnapping each others pups.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: In Blackburn, Anita Manning values a gold charm bracelet, and Philip Serrell takes a shine to an unusual globe. Paul Martin finds about the remarkable life of classical singer Kathleen Ferrier.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, former winners Tim Key, Jamie Laing, Sunetra Sarker and Laura Whitmore take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway exploration of the Channel coastline and Thames estuary via Calais has reached the Isle of Thanet. Flat and temperate, its excellent terrain for growing.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Texan supermodel Jerry Hall and psychotherapist Philippa Perry take to the road in a gigantic 1970s Buick. Squeezing through the narrowest of country lanes, the celebrities are advised and assisted by antique experts Tim Medhurst and Charles Hanson.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A kayaker has called a mayday after getting into trouble; although hes able to communicate via his VHF radio, its a race against time to find him.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: In 1986, the cutthroat world of commercial television news throws ambitious reporter Dale and newsreader Helen together.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The story of a giant otter cub, who was rescued and is being raised by Brazilian naturalist Carolina Vargas. Sancho has to be bottle-fed, shown how to catch fish, and taught to outsmart the many predators of the Pantanal, the worlds biggest wetland.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Mark Chapman presents highlights from the opening match week of the 2025-26 Champions League. Newcastle take on Barcelona at St James Park in a repeat of their 1997 Group Stage classic, and Manchester City host Italian champions Napoli.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A frantic mother alerts the lifeguards after six teenagers are cut off by the tide. The Anstruther crew race to the rescue of a female paddleboarder. The reports of a clothed person entering the water lead the Selsey crew to a late-night search.

programme.title: King and Conqueror
programme.desc: Harold and Edith risk their lives to bargain with William but get a guarded reception. Harolds siblings face hardships trying to secure their familys future.

programme.title: The Newsreader
programme.desc: When news of an Alaskan oil spill breaks on the day of Public Eyes launch, Helen is pressured to rethink her show format, whilst combating a brutal act of sabotage from Lindsay. Dale tries to land an interview with the PM.

programme.title: Freddie Flintoffs Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Having created a cricket team like no other in Preston and taken them on a life-changing tour to India, sporting legend Freddie Flintoff is determined to prove that his previous success was not a one-off. He has a much more ambitious plan.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: A weekly programme from the BBC World Service, bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world. In our first episode, Nawal Al-Maghafi reports on the escalating crisis in Sudan.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Groundbreaking storytelling techniques reveal the high-stakes drama that unfolds at the epicenter of recent natural disasters, as told through firsthand accounts and mobile phone footage filmed by everyday people caught in the eye of the storm.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Competition is fierce as local merchant Robert and wife Kelly open up a fish and chip restaurant. Plus, follow the journey of the turbot as it goes from sea to the dinner plate.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant looks at the secrets of hotels.

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Carlton Towers hosts a British culinary weekend for eager tourists, while a group of budding wine connoisseurs arrive at Chillingham Castle for a tasting weekend.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Enoch `Nucky Thompson addresses the Temperance League, spinning a tale of a young boy who struggled to feed his family. The desperate boy, who turns out to be Nucky himself, killed rats so his family had something to eat. With Prohibition just hours away, people are stocking up on alcohol, a funeral procession for `John Barleycorn, a giant liquor bottle in a casket, marks the end of an era.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: A large crowd gathers to watch the funeral of Big Jim Colosimo in Chicago. Newsmen hound Johnny Torrio, asking him if he was involved in the murder, but Torrio and Capone brush them off.

programme.title: Westworld
programme.desc: Westworld isnt your typical amusement park. Intended for rich vacationers, the futuristic park - which is looked after by robotic `hosts - allows its visitors to live out their fantasies through artificial consciousness.

programme.title: Das Boot

programme.title: Das Boot

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Simon, the survivor of the shooting, is rushed to a hospital in Pennsylvania, barely alive. Annoyed that Jimmy left a witness, Nucky instructs his brother to help `nature take its course.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Jimmy forms new relationships in Chicago; Nucky celebrates a U.S. Senator; Chalky identifies a lynching suspect; Margaret and Lucy clash.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Meldrick and Theresa learn that a tenant of the apartment building where Kay, Beau and Stan were sent may be responsible for wounding the detectives.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Bayliss is forced to launch a solo investigation when his colleagues prove reluctant to co-operate on a case involving a cop-shooter.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: And Now His Watch Is Ended

programme.title: Atomic
programme.desc: In Casablanca, Max and JJ try to win back the uranium. But as the cartel closes in, the pair face a choice.

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Joel and Ellie, a pair connected through the harshness of the world they live in, are forced to endure brutal circumstances and ruthless killers on a trek across a post-outbreak America.

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: During an awkward lunch with her publisher, Julia is unexpectedly inspired by an offhand comment from a well-respected chef.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Bobby `Bacala Baccilieri Sr. comes out of retirement, which displeases his son and Uncle Junior, and Carmela takes an active role in Tonys therapy.

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood
programme.desc: Someone has discovered Jim Lindsays secret identity, leading Dexter to realise that he might not be the only serial killer in town; Harrison spirals out of control during a wrestling match; Angela makes a dark discovery of her own.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion gains new responsibilities; Jon is taken to the Fist of the First Men; Daenerys meets with the slavers; Jaime strikes a deal with his captors.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
programme.desc: The Nights Watch takes stock; Varys meets his better; Arya is taken to the commander of the Brotherhood; Daenerys makes an exchange.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
programme.desc: The Nights Watch takes stock; Varys meets his better; Arya is taken to the commander of the Brotherhood; Daenerys makes an exchange.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw, Dominic Toretto, Brian OConner and the rest of the crew have separated to return to more normal lives. However, Deckard Shaw, Owens older brother, is thirsty for revenge. A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.title: Shaolin Soccer
programme.desc: A Shaolin monk-warrior who has trouble finding work, transfers his skills, and those of his fellow monks to football.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Op and Ed accidentally time-travel from the Galapagos Islands in 1835 to present-day Shanghai. They make their way through the city in confusion and make the horrifying discovery that the species to which they belong became extinct shortly after.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Promising business executive Tim is desperate to impress his boss and be promoted. Having secured a huge contract with a Swiss businessman, his manager invites him to an exclusive dinner party where the employee who brings along the most eccentric guest earns a trophy and the praise of the assembled executives. He finds the perfect candidate in a strange IRS employee, but things soon start to fall apart.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Promising business executive Tim is desperate to impress his boss and be promoted. Having secured a huge contract with a Swiss businessman, his manager invites him to an exclusive dinner party where the employee who brings along the most eccentric guest earns a trophy and the praise of the assembled executives. He finds the perfect candidate in a strange IRS employee, but things soon start to fall apart.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago teen Ren and his family move to the small midwestern town of Bomont, where rock music has been banned.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Beach Rats
programme.desc: An aimless teen in Brooklyn, NY, spends the summer with his delinquent buddies, a potential new girlfriend and older men that he meets online.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving town 10 years prior, a transgender man reunites with his friends and family for the first time since his transition.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Following another successful mission, International Rescue faces a crisis when its space station, Thunderbird 5, is damaged by a suspected meteor strike. However, criminal mastermind Aristotle Spode, aka the Hood, is waiting for the team to vacate their secret island base so that he can take control and learn more about their operation.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago teen Ren and his family move to the small midwestern town of Bomont, where rock music has been banned.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michaels a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.desc: The story behind the Veuve Clicquot champagne family and business that began in the late 18th century.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A divorced train commuter passes the house she used to live in with her husband every day. To distract herself she creates a fictional perfect world for her former neighbours in her head. This is ruined when one of the neighbours goes missing.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death
programme.desc: 40 years after Eel Marsh Houses first haunting, a group of children and a schoolteacher take refuge at the house, escaping from WWII London. There they will awaken the houses darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: Friends unwittingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate, racing against death to escape the future foretold in their readings.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.desc: A womans whirlwind romance with a handsome stranger soon turns into a web of deceit, mistrust and violence aboard his yacht.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: A dedicated family man becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house - an obsession that could cost him everything.

programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: In 1970s London, a former member of the IRA sets out to avenge his wifes murder. Sky Original thriller starring Aml Ameen, Colin Morgan, Mark Strong and Felicity Jones.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance. Despite Battersbys warning that the clapper is fragile and doesnt have a spare, Tommy and Tallulah manage to break it. Deciding that they must make a replacement, they look everywhere for something to use and try some very unusual options. Will the bell be ready for Chime Time?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Tommy and Tallulah agree to babysit the spring chicks while Madame Au Lait tends to Mother Chicks hurt wing, they dont realise that how much of a handful the chicks will be. The twins are also taking part in the town kite display today, but somehow the chicks end up surfing on their kite, high in the sky! The twins must stage an airborne rescue before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are organising McCogginss pile of interesting junk when a vitally important spring goes missing. They cant chime the time without it! The twins chase the spring all over town as it bounces around causing chaos, eventually ending up attaching Pufferty to his kennel. Every time he tries to go somewhere, the spring pulls him back.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: McCoggins tells the twins not to stray far, but they forget to warn Pufferty when they try to teach him how to play hide and seek. There are not many places in Tickety Town big enough to hide a huge dog train, so Pufferty heads far off into the hills. Where can he be? The race is on to find him by Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah find harvesting very slow when they volunteer to pick Lopsiloos vegetables. Surely there must be some way to speed it up? However, when they hit upon the idea of using Pufferty to pull all the vegetables up at once, they are shocked to find that Puffertys carriages unhook and run amok through Tickety Town.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to deliver a precious package to Madame Au Lait and decide that a ride with Pufferty is safest way to transport it. However, when Hopparoo challenges the lovable dog train to a race, the package bounces out of the carriage and embarks upon a crazy journey round Tickety Town, with Tommy and Tallulah in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: A risky plan is hatched to abandon the Destiny using the last working shuttle and the crew is hinging all their hopes on one of the three nearby planets being habitable. Theres only room for 17 people and a lottery that plays with human lives will determine who goes and who stays.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Despite severe rationing and stringent security, Destinys water reserves are plummeting as fast as the crews morale. Rush is stumped by the latest setback and informs his comrades that in order to survive, they must find an alternative source of H2O right away. The nearest planet is a frozen wasteland surrounded by a thin, poisonous atmosphere.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: The Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo starts a new term. Newbie Bumi struggles to focus while Skittish Rumba takes her first timid steps toward independence. Star student Valentino experiences a bumpy start to college, but supporters cheer him on.

programme.desc: A Chilean arms dealer kidnaps a woman and her daughter; crossing paths with his brother, Tan is forced to come clean to his family about his divorce from Bonnie; Hondo discovers that Hicks has received a job offer that could lure him away.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Oscar returns from his long vacation with mixed emotions about whether or not he still wants to be a part of the office.

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant send Karl to Alaska to go whale watching. Karl takes a ride on a dog sled, stays with the local Inuit community, eats raw frozen meat and gets very sick on a deep sea fishing trawler.

programme.title: The Paper
programme.desc: Ned chases a story about a local scammer operating through a dating app, learning that Esmeralda is one of the victims.

programme.title: The Paper
programme.desc: In Toledo, Ohio, a documentary crew focuses its efforts on `The Truth Teller, a historic but declining Midwestern newspaper trying to resurrect itself with volunteer reporters. Following the lives and struggles of dreamers in love with journalism.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: A risky plan is hatched to abandon the Destiny using the last working shuttle and the crew is hinging all their hopes on one of the three nearby planets being habitable. Theres only room for 17 people and a lottery that plays with human lives will determine who goes and who stays.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Despite severe rationing and stringent security, Destinys water reserves are plummeting as fast as the crews morale. Rush is stumped by the latest setback and informs his comrades that in order to survive, they must find an alternative source of H2O right away. The nearest planet is a frozen wasteland surrounded by a thin, poisonous atmosphere.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: The Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo starts a new term. Newbie Bumi struggles to focus while Skittish Rumba takes her first timid steps toward independence. Star student Valentino experiences a bumpy start to college, but supporters cheer him on.

programme.desc: A woman alleges her Bulldog rescue charity was forced to close after internet defamation and sues for $5000. The defendant claims funds were being misappropriated by the plaintiff.

programme.desc: When Gagandip Singhs body was discovered in a burnt-out car, detectives found out that his father was murdered on a business trip - was there a connection between both deaths?

programme.desc: In 1986 the body of Patrice LaBlanc surfaces in a Texas Lake. Shes been stabbed 39 times by her drag queen boyfriend Cliff Youens. Now he confesses to his crimes.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Were Loyd and Agnes Courtney beaten and stabbed to death by their daughter Deborah? Prosecutors say it was for money, but Deborah says she didnt do it.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: An elderly lady and her care taker are murdered. Earl Linebaugh and Melissa Harris are sentenced to life with no parole, but Melissa says shes a victim too.

programme.desc: After a woman goes missing, her husband is the prime suspect, until key evidence found in a burned out car sheds new light on the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators believe a sinister blood trail will lead them to a missing woman, but shes nowhere to be found. Soon fresh evidence crops up.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a young girl is found dead in her backyard, her parents tell the police that she was killed by the family dogs.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.sub-title: The Ever-Changing Dog-Attack Story; Fumigation Fence War!
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy is bitten by a leashed dog whose owner denies being at fault despite another incident the next day. Allegedly negligent behaviour leads to a fence falling on a womans parked car.

programme.sub-title: Rottweiler Puppy Fail; Pro-Bono Publicist Scam?!

programme.sub-title: Icy Road Spin Scare!; Dune Buggy Bamboozle

programme.desc: A security camera catches a parking-lot fight; criminal charges are filed when roommates cannot agree on rental terms.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his early 20th century Bradshaws Guide, Michael Portillo embarks on a journey through Britains industrial heartland in the footsteps of King George V. He starts in Warrington and learns how the mayor, Dr George Joseph, received the royal party in the parlour of Warringtons magnificent town hall.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Blackburn Michael catches a rare glimpse of Edwardian life on celluloid and marvels at how factory workers and schoolchildren alike were drawn to seek fame on film. Continuing east to Nelson, Michael braves the enemy camp to have a pint of tea with the socialist working classes in Britains last Clarion House. Way out of his comfort zone, he is heartened by their warm welcome.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Manchester at the magnificent Heaton Park, Michael discovers one of the first open air concerts was held here in 1909 by an opera fan, William Grimshaw, who entertained 40,000 people to the music of opera superstar, Enrico Caruso, on a gramophone.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael heads for Maltby, where he is caught up with the thrill of the chase as he investigates the high-octane sport of whippet racing. He learns how this `poor mans sport grew during the 19th century in the mining towns of the north and retains its appeal today.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: The Mathewson family continue their pursuit of classic cars. In the home counties, Derek picks up two expertly crafted replicas of the batmobile. Meanwhile, Dave struggles to contain his enthusiasm for a Second World War Ford jeep.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul picks up a stunning 1961 Vauxhall Cresta, Dave drools over a Ford Sierra Sapphire Cosworth, and Derek refuses a test drive in the worlds smallest production car, the 3.5 horsepower Peel P50.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: At the peak of his power, Hitler now faces fellow ruthless dictator Stalin. He tries to deceive Stalin with a plan to invade Britain, all while preparing an attack on the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A US Army Air Force C47 that dropped paratroopers on D-Day is at the centre of one of the UKs most ambitious warbird rebuilds.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visits Ashton Court in Bristol where intriguing finds include a nautilus shell engraved with Brunels suspension bridge, an automaton that smokes and the newest item the team have ever seen - a piece of Banksy graffiti.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.sub-title: The Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art 3
programme.desc: The team visit the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art where discoveries include a stunning piece of Swedish glass, an invitation to Sir Walter Scotts funeral, a stuffed toy called Little Jack Rabbit and one of the rarest money boxes ever found on the show.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team buy one of Dereks favourite Austin commercials and convert it to electric, and also snap up a super-rare 50s American beach bike.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Can the team finally smell profit when they sniff out a bargain Porsche? A DIY job on a Fiat should also keep the accountant happy but will it go to plan?

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: The last leg of Simons journey begins in the jungles of Southeast Asia and ends in the tropical paradise of Hawaii. In Laos, he samples some local delicacies, and in Vietnam, he discovers cruelly caged moon bears, farmed for their bile. Next stop is Taiwan, where Simon meets some of the worlds highest achieving children. Finally in Hawaii, Simon looks at the environmental problems, including dirty beaches.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie pick up a JZR three wheeler speed demon while Dave gets all nostalgic over a brace of Raleigh Choppers, a couple of Honda C90s and a rare Mark 1 Ford Granada.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2, but it remains to be seen whether there is any money to be made from this low-spec car.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Bangers and Cash spin-off series that follows the journey of a vehicle purchased at a Mathewsons classic car auction, before being repaired, restored and re-auctioned.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek takes a long drive in a 1960s bus that has had a life in the sun, Dave helps a collector trim his fleet of British classics by taking a Triumph TR7 convertible for auction, and Paul is confused by an agricultural Bonser truck.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are in the Cotswolds and Somerset, where their finds include a set of milk churns and an old munitions shell.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring a once lavish palace in Iraq, the Sathorn Unique, an epic ghost tower in Thailand, and a former sports stadium in Georgia USA.
